resources.string: SSL certificate of the CA which signed the server certificate:
This is no valid certificate. Please use X.509 in pem format.
This System does not support X.509 certificates. That might mean that no connection will be possible.
Could not read certificate data. What did you enter?
The certificate could not be used. Is it correct?
The app was unable to send a request.
The response was not in JSON format. The server is probably wrong.
The response was in JSON format but contained no OK. Maybe this server is no sync server but some other server that returns JSON data?
The server presented a certificate with these fingerprints:
Is this your server? Only accept the certificate if the fingerprint is correct.
